=============
API Reference
=============

This section provides detailed documentation for all pirrtools modules and classes.

Core Modules
============

pirrtools package
-----------------

.. automodule:: pirrtools
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:

pirrtools.pandas module
-----------------------

Enhanced pandas functionality with caching and Rich table styling.

.. automodule:: pirrtools.pandas
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:

Data Structures
===============

pirrtools.structures package
----------------------------

.. automodule:: pirrtools.structures
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:

AttrPath
--------

File system navigation with attribute access.

.. automodule:: pirrtools.structures.attrpath
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:

AttrDict
--------

Dictionary with attribute access capabilities.

.. automodule:: pirrtools.structures.attrdict
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:
